column5: ama Ewuradze n'asɛm no atserɛw ntsɛntsɛm na wɔahyɛ no enyimnyam wɔ beebiara dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse wɔ hom nkyɛn no;"

column2: "na wɔngye hɛn mfi nyimpabɔnfo nye emumuyɛfo nsamu
column3: osiandɛ nnyɛ nyimpa nyina na wɔwɔ gyedzi no."

column4: na ɔakora hom do wɔ omumuyɛnyi no ho."

column2: "Na yɛwɔ Ewuradze mu awerɛhyɛmu wɔ hom ho dɛ hom reyɛ dza yɛakyerɛ hom no
"Na Ewuradze ngya hom akoma nkɔ Nyankopɔn ho dɔ nye penkyɛr a Kraest dze ma no mu."

column5: dɛ hom ntwe homho mfi onua biara a ɔnantsew basabasa
column6: na onndzi tsetse nkyerɛkyerɛ a yɛdze maa hom no do ho."

column2: "Na homankasa hom nyim dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ hom suasua hɛn; osiandɛ yɛannyɛ akwadwer wɔ hom mu;"

column3: na mbom mbɔdzembɔ mu nye ɔberɛ mu na yɛyɛɛ edwuma adzekyee nye adzesaa
column4: amma yaannyɛ adzesoadze amma hom mu biara:"

column2: "nnyɛ dɛ yennyi ho kwan bi a
column3: na mbom ama yɛdze hɛnho aayɛ fasusu ma hom esua hɛn."

column4: Sɛ obi mmpɛ dɛ ɔyɛ edwuma a

column2: "Na yɛtse dɛ binom wɔ hɔ a wɔnantsew basabasa wɔ hom mu
column3: wɔnnyɛ edwuma na mbom wɔyɛ apɛsɛmedzifo."
yɛhyɛ hɔn na yetu hɔn fo wɔ Ewuradze Jesus mu dɛ wɔnyɛ foo nyɛ edwuma na wondzi hɔnankasa hɔn edziban."

column4: mma hom mmberɛ wɔ papayɛ mu."

column2: "Na sɛ obi enntsie hɛn asɛm a ɔwɔ nwoma yi mu no a
column3: hom nhyɛ no nsew na mma hom nnye no mmbɔ fɛkuw
mbom hom ntu no fo dɛ onua."

column2: "Na afei asomdwee Ewuradze nankasa mma hom asomdwee daa wɔ adze nyina mu. Ewuradze nye hom nyina ntsena."
"Emi Paul me nkyia a medze mankasa me nsa akyerɛw no nye yi. Iyi nye m'ahyɛnsewdze wɔ krataa biara a mekyerɛw ho
column3: kwan a mefa do kyerɛw nye yi."

column2: "Hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest adom nka hom nyinara."
